item.title: 最新消息：据一名来自危地马拉的移民少年的律师何塞-贝兹（Jose Baez）称，在他因一名佛罗里达州警察死亡而被捕近一年后，他的案件已被撤销。
item.description:

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）起诉了OpenAI及其首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman），称这家聊天GPT制造商在冲刺利润的过程中放弃了造福人类的使命。
item.description:
Elon Musk sued OpenAI and its CEO Sam Altman alleging the ChatGPT maker abandoned its mission of benefiting humanity in a sprint toward profits.

Some legal experts, however, cast doubt on Musk's case. https://t.co/q7puhkJO35

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 据密苏里州公路巡警称，一名警官和一名法院工作人员周四在密苏里州独立市的一栋住宅（距离堪萨斯城约一小时车程）驱逐过程中遭到枪击后死亡。
item.description:

item.title: 华盛顿特区巡回上诉法院合议庭做出的一项裁决可能会影响到因参与 1 月 6 日骚乱而被定罪和判刑的数十名骚乱者的刑期。

item.title: 虽然总统提名竞选可能已经接近尾声，但下选区初选季将在超级星期二正式拉开帷幕，这是总统选举年初选日程中最繁忙的一天。以下是值得关注的 12 场超级星期二初选：
item.description:
While the presidential nomination race may be winding down, downballot primary season is officially kicking off on Super Tuesday, the busiest day of the primary calendar in presidential election years.

Here are 12 Super Tuesday primaries to watch: https://t.co/pzqiqds1hh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：拜登总统签署了一项短期支出措施，使一组联邦机构和另一组联邦机构分别在 3 月 8 日和 3 月 22 日之前继续运作，从而正式避免了本将于周日开始的政府部分停摆。
item.description:
JUST IN: Pres. Biden signed a short-term spending measure that keeps one set of federal agencies operating through March 8 and another set through March 22 — officially staving off a partial government shutdown that would have started on Sunday. https://t.co/9YdBuBu7vO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 请看：据肯塔基州路易斯维尔消防局称，周五中午12点左右，一辆半挂卡车被发现悬挂在第二街大桥的边缘。
item.description:
SEE IT: At around noon on Friday, a semi truck was found dangling off the edge of the Second Street Bridge, according to the Louisville Fire Department in Kentucky.

The driver of the semi truck was inside the dangling truck for about 40 minutes before she was safely rescued. pic.twitter.com/hriZdMOm6A

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：CVS 和沃尔格林连锁药店宣布，将于本月内在美国多个州开始销售堕胎药米非司酮。拜登总统在一份声明中称此举是确保人们获得这种药物的 "重要里程碑"。
item.description:
BREAKING: CVS and Walgreens will begin selling the abortion pill mifepristone within the month in several states, the pharmacy chains announced.

In a statement, Pres. Biden called the move an "important milestone" in ensuring access to the drug. https://t.co/23vlhbmZdn pic.twitter.com/1rviFolgbm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）周五重申了她将在 "超级星期二 "之前继续参加总统初选的承诺，并暗示在 "超级星期二 "之后是否继续参选将取决于她在初选和党团会议中是否仍有 "竞争力"。
item.description:
Nikki Haley on Friday reiterated her promise to stay in the presidential primary race through Super Tuesday, hinting that decisions to stay in the race beyond Tuesday will be based on whether she's still "competitive" in primaries and caucuses. https://t.co/wk8j2GTZ0J
